nature_language: [当前位置苏州,目标位置武汉,旅行人数3,旅行天数5] 我们3个人去武汉旅游五天，预计在珞珈山附近居住，想去品尝当地美食，有什么推荐的吗？
nature_language_en: [Current location: Suzhou, Destination: Wuhan, Number of travelers: 3, Number of travel days: 5] The three of us are going to Wuhan for a five-day trip. We plan to stay near Luojia Mountain and would like to try some local cuisine. Do you have any recommendations?
